Batch Generator¶

This module provides a BatchGenerator class that generates batches of input and target data.

Classes: - BatchGenerator

Dependencies: - torch - typing.List - typing.Tuple

class utils.batch_generator.BatchGenerator(data, batch_size)¶

Bases: object

A generator that provides batches of input and target data.

Parameters

  • data (List[Tuple[torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor]]) – The input and target data to batch.

  • batch_size (int) – The size of each batch.

data¶

The input and target data.

Type

List[Tuple[torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor]]

batch_size¶

The size of each batch.

Type

int

num_batches¶

The total number of batches.

Type

int
